commentaries.commentary: Arjen Robben receives it in midfield, dribbling forward with purpose! A precise pass out wide to Rafinha on the right wing. Good control by Rafinha!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: That's brilliant from Rafinha! He penetrates the box with a low cross... AND SCHWEINSTEIGER! GOAL! What a finish by Bastian Schweinsteiger! Absolutely clinical!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Bastian Schweinsteiger celebrates with immense joy, arms raised towards the stands! Teammates rush to embrace him. The crowd is absolutely ecstatic, red shirts jumping and waving scarves. A truly vibrant atmosphere!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: You can really feel that energy! The team is united in celebration, high fives and spirited hugs all around. That's what a crucial goal does for team spirit!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: The cross is in! What a header! Goal! Player #31 powers it into the top left! Absolutely unstoppable! What a finish!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Unbelievable! That header had power and incredible precision. Player #31 rose perfectly. The keeper had no chance. What a brilliant goal to start!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2
